comment.shortText: Reports the statistics of the remote audio.
User ID of the remote user sending the audio streams.
Audio quality received by the user. See {@link AgoraNetworkQuality}.
Network delay (ms) from the sender to the receiver.
Network delay (ms) from the receiver to the jitter buffer.
Packet loss rate in the reported interval.

shortText: The sample rate (Hz) of the received audio stream in the reported
The average bitrate (Kbps) of the received audio stream in the reported

text: In the reported interval, audio freeze occurs when the audio frame loss
rate reaches 4%. `totalFrozenTime` = the number of audio freeze x 2 x
shortText: The total freeze time (ms) of the remote audio stream after the remote
The total audio freeze time as a percentage (%) of the total time

comment.shortText: The total active time (ms) of the remote audio stream after the remote user joins the channel.
The total active time (ms) of the remote audio stream after the remote user publish the audio stream.
